data.eml:eml: Sergey gen. n., a new doryctine genus from temperate forests of Mexico and Cuba (Hymenoptera, Braconidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Martinez, Juan Jose, Lazaro, Rubi Nelsi Meza, Pedraza-Lara, Carlos, Zaldivar-Riveron, Alejandro (2016): Sergey gen. n., a new doryctine genus from temperate forests of Mexico and Cuba (Hymenoptera, Braconidae). ZooKeys 589: 143-164, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.589.8291, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.589.8291
